sentences.sContent: ...a collage of words and pictures from magazines.
sentences.sCn: …用杂志上的词语和图片做成的拼贴画。

remMethod.val: 大学 (college)学生来自五湖四海就像一幅各地的拼贴画 (collage)

trans.tranCn: 抽象拚贴画（用报纸、布、压平的花等碎片拼合而成的）
trans.tranOther: a picture made by sticking other pictures, photographs, cloth etc onto a surface
